mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projectmanagement (uuid, mount, money, name, creatuser, company, dataURL, ifWork, test, creattime, testtime, worktime) VALUES (#{projectManagement.uuid}, #{projectManagement.mount}, #{projectManagement.money}, #{projectManagement.name}, #{projectManagement.creatuser}, #{projectManagement.company}, #{projectManagement.dataURL}, #{projectManagement.ifWork}, #{projectManagement.test}, #{projectManagement.creattime}, #{projectManagement.testtime}, #{projectManagement.worktime})
mapper.update: UPDATE projectmanagement SET test = #{test} WHERE uuid = #{uuid};
